text: Georges Bernier (21 September 1929 â€“ 10 January 2005), more commonly known as Le Professeur Choron, was a French humorist. He was the founder of Hara Kiri magazine and helped discover Charlie Hebdo, a satirical newspaper. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2005 deaths Category:French comedians
title: Professeur Choron
